professional_summary: Experienced Senior Database Administrator with expertise in DB2 UDB, Oracle, and various database management tools. Proven track record in database administration, migration, performance tuning, and high-availability cluster configuration.

key_responsibilities: Installation and configuration of DB2 environments
Upgrading and migrating databases from v9.x to v10.1
Designing and configuring HADR-TSA/HADR-VCS clusters
Applying db2 patches with zero down-time maintenance
Setting up Q-Replication for data synchronization
Managing tablespaces
indexes
and triggers
Performance tuning and optimization of database systems
Monitoring and maintaining high-availability environments
Ensuring security compliance and disaster recovery planning
Creating/maintaining DB2 UDB instances on AIX and Linux platforms
Implementing data compression techniques to reduce storage costs
Stabilizing and optimizing database environments post-migration
Upgrading databases to v9.7 fp7 and higher versions
Configuring HADR and HACMP for high-availability solutions
Implementing IBM OPM tool for proactive monitoring
Fine-tuning SQL queries for performance optimization
Loading large-scale data using efficient methods
Developing comprehensive backup and recovery strategies
Granting and revoking database user privileges
Capturing and analyzing database explain plans
Managing system and object level roles for security
Conducting regular health checks and performance assessments
Assisting application development teams during database integration
Coordinating with data modelers for schema optimization
Maintaining detailed documentation of all database configurations

technical_skills:
DB2 UDB Administration",
      "Oracle Database Management",
      "AIX and Linux System Administration",
      "Database Migration and Upgradation",
      "Performance Tuning and Optimization",
      "High-Availability Cluster Configuration",
      "Security Compliance and Auditing",
      "Disaster Recovery Planning
